column2: An influential [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] such as me surely deserves to be recognized as something more. In time, other rulers will acknowledge my claim, should I be so bold as to announce it...
A powerful [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] such as me surely deserves to be recognized as something more. In time, other rulers will acknowledge my claim, should I be so bold as to announce it...
